resources.string: The battery level is too low to run the camera. Please charge your phone.
Battery currently too low to run the camera.
"All settings will be reset to the default values. Continue?"
Camera is disabled by the Exchange server policy.
Camera is disabled by server policy
Cannot use camera while connected to HDMI.
Cannot use camera in dual display mode.
Cannot use camera because SD card is mounted to a PC. Disconnect USB to proceed.
"Camera is not available. Mass storage connected to PC."

"Not enough memory in %1$s. Your file will be saved to %2$s. Free more memory in %3$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager.
Launch file manager now? Check your files in '%4$s'"
"Not enough memory in %1$s. Your file will be saved to %2$s. Free more memory in %3$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager."

"Not enough memory in %1$s. Free more memory in %1$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager.
Launch file manager now? Check your files in '%2$s'"
"Not enough memory in %1$s. Free more memory in %1$s by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager."

"Not enough memory in all memory. Free more memory by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager.
Launch file manager now? Check your files in '%1$s'"
"Not enough memory in all memory. Free more memory by connecting phone to PC or launching file manager."
Not enough space on internal memory.
Not enough space on internal storage.
Not enough space on SD card.
File is save to internal memory.
File is save to internal storage.
File is save to SD card.
To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on %s. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on %1$s. File is save to %2$s. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on all storage. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on %s. Saving file...
Not enough space on internal memory. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on internal storage. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on SD card. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on internal memory. File will be saved to SD card. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on internal storage. File will be saved to SD card. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on SD card. File will be saved to internal memory. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on SD card. File will be saved to internal storage. To free up space, delete unused files.
Not enough space on internal memory. Saving file...
Not enough space on internal storage. Saving file...
Not enough space on SD card. Saving file...
"Not enough storage on all Memory. Free more memory."
Insert a new external memory card or delete some contents.
"Not enough storage on internal memory. Your file will be saved to SD card."
"Not enough storage on SD card. Free more memory."
"Not enough storage on SD card. Your file will be saved to internal memory."
"Media is scanning. Try again, after media scanning completion."
Try again after scanning media files.
SD card does not exist. Storage is changed to internal memory.
SD card is removed. Storage is changed to internal memory.
SD card is removed. Insert the SD card.
SD card is unexpectedly removed. Camera is closed.
SD card inserted. Save to SD card?
"Internal memory or SD card is full. Delete some contents."
"SD card is full. Delete some contents."
Cannot use camera when MHL cable is connected.
Cannot show camera preview when MHL cable is connected.
The photos will be uploaded to U+ Box. Data charge may apply when connected mobile data.
"Network error. The photos will be Automatically uploaded to U+ Box When network is available."
"Photos will be automatically uploaded to U+ Box."
Say \"%s\" when you get ready to take a picture.
To take photo, say one of the following words.
Cheese shutter waits to take the photo until you to say one of these words:
These media files will be deleted.
Shot mode is change to normal.
Timer mode is set to off.
Automatically takes a picture when a smile is detected.
Focus mode is set to auto.
White balance is set to auto.
Scene mode is set to auto.
Scene mode is set to normal.
Only support landscape recording for sending as MMS.
The battery can not be enough to run the camera.
You cannot record video during a call.
Unable to record video during call.
Unable to start camera during call
Unable to start camera during video call.
Cannot start recording while other application is using audio.
Cannot run the camera. Feature is locked from the server side.
Switching the main and secondary camera.
Enlarge or shorten the size of subjects.
Flash is off for every shot.
Flash is on for every shot.
Best for printing up to A4 size.
Best for printing up to about A5 size.
Best for printing up to about postcard size.
Best for printing to size smaller than postcards.
Best for sending as e-mail attachment (takes small amount of memory).
Best for sending as e-mail attachment (takes small amount of memory).
Setting appropriate mode for the current environment.
Automatically adjusts according to the circumstances.
Capturing fast-moving images without subject blur.
Rendering colour under a wide range of lighting conditions.
For pictures taken in soft lightings.
For pictures taken in fluorescent light.
For pictures taken in the shade or on cloudy days.
No colour effect will be applied.
Applying sepia filter effect to take a nostalgic picture.
Applying mono filter effect to take a black & white picture.
Applying negative filter effect to invert the colour of the picture.
Applies vividy colour effect to pictures.
Applies Negative sepia colour effect to pictures.
Applies Blue colour effect to pictures.
Applies Posterize colour effect to pictures.
Applies Aqua colour effect to pictures.
Applies Pastel colour effect to pictures.
Setting the time delay between the moment when pressing the shutter button and taking a picture.
Automatically triggers the shutter when camera detects a smile.
Automatically removes spots and imperfections of faces and making the faces appear bright and clear.
Creates an artistic masterpiece with effects including, black & white, warm & cold exposure and more.
Taking the full range of continuous imagery and assembling into one picture.
Give various effects by using face detection.
Allows the phone to take cartoonish and picturesque image like a drawing.
Automatically enables various animation mask on the face when camera detects a face.
Automatically detects a face and gives Blur effect on the face.
Makes snow falling effect on the head.
Finds the face automatically and sets the background out of focus.
Automatically enables Mosaic effect on the face when camera detects a face.
Automatically enables Fish-eye effect on the face when camera detects a face.
Automatically enables Concave effect on the face when camera detects a face.
Takes photo of an object that is very close.
Automatically detecting and focusing on faces.
Find the moving object automatically and set focus on the object.
Manually set the spot to focus.
Sets the image quality (better the quality, more the memory consumption).
Save images for super fine quality.
Showing the latest taken image after taking a picture.
Sets the sound played when taking a picture.
Adding geographically identified information where the picture is taken.
Best for sending as e-mail attachment (takes small amount of memory).
Finds the colour and light settings appropriate for the current environment.
Automatically adjusts according to the circumstances.
Better for recording natural scenery such as trees, flowers and sky.
Better for recording scenes with fast moving objects, such as sports.
Captures beautiful night scenery. Slow shutter speeds are used to detect night landscapes.
Improves colour qualities under different lighting conditions.
For videos recorded in soft lightings.
For videos recorded in fluorescent light.
For videos recorded in the shade or on cloudy days.
No colour effect will be applied.
Applying sepia filter effect to take a nostalgic video.
Applying mono filter effect to take a black & white video.
Applying negative filter effect to invert the colour of the video.
Applies vividy colour effect to videos.
Applies Negative sepia colour effect to videos.
Applies Blue colour effect to videos.
Applies Posterize colour effect to videos.
Applies Aqua colour effect to videos.
Applies Pastel colour effect to videos.
Sets the video quality (better the quality, more the memory consumption).
Save videos for super fine quality.
Setting the sound recording while video taping.
Camera has stopped unexpectedly, need to restart.
Turn on the GPS from the setting to use location tag.

By selecting \"Geotagging\", this device will attach, embed and store geographical location data within each picture. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit or copy these pictures since they contain the location where the picture was taken.

By selecting Tag Location, this device will attach, embed and store geographical location data within each picture. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit or copy these pictures since they contain the location where the picture was taken.
Turn on the LBS from the setting to use location tag.
Your file will be saved to internal memory, go to Settings>SD card & storage.
Your file will be saved to external memory, go to Settings>SD card & storage.
"Press the 'back button' once more, camera will be closed."
"Maximum recording size has been reached. File has been saved."
"Maximum recording size (%s) has been reached. File is saved."
"Max. recording size reached. Recording will end soon."
"Max. recording size (%s) reached. Recording will end soon."
Maximum recording time for MMS is about %d seconds
Attachment file size limit is small than min. recording size.
Smart shutter provide stabilized photos in unintentional shaking.
Capturing fast-moving images without subject blur indoor.
Taking picture with brighten and blurry effects.
Blending several shots taken of the same high-contrast scene at different exposures to create more natural look.
Recording fast moving objects to be played slowly.
Taking sequential six pictures at once before the shutter key is touched.
Taking sequential five pictures at once before the shutter key is touched.
Capturing screen shot during video recording.
Changing backgrounds and providing morphing effects to transform facial features during video recording.
Remove battery or move to a cool place.
Max. attachment file size limit exceeded.
Heat sensor detected high temperatures. Cannot launch camera.
Heat sensor detected high temperatures. Video recording will close.
Unable to record video to maintain optimal phone temperature. Try again later.
Use caution. Taking video while charging may increase the temperature of your device
Flash is turned off to maintain optimal phone temperature.

"Place your device on a steady surface and be sure there is no movement behind you.
Then step out of the camera view."
"Hold the device in order not to shake and be sure there's no movement. When ready to record a video, let the shooting subject step into the camera's view."
Switch between front and back cameras.
Turn flash on to take brighter photos with a smaller preview while using front camera.
Turn the flash on when needed
Automatically detects and focuses on faces
Increase sensitivity in low-light conditions to reduce blur.
Adjust image colour temperatures that are preset according to the light source.
White balance automatically adjusted to suit lighting conditions.
Use in shade and on cloudy days.
Use in shade and on cloudy days.
Set coloured filter effect when take pictures
Capture images in black and white.
Set 3, 5 or 10 seconds delay before the shot
Sweep camera horizontally across a scene to produce a panoramic image.
Set sound effect for taking a picture
Show the photo immediately after it was taken.
Add the location where the picture was taken.
Set coloured filter effect when record videos.
Record videos in black and white.
Capture screen shot while record video
Change backgrounds and provide morph effects to transform facial features when record video.
Set the sound while record video
Show the video immediately after it was recorded.
Add location information where the video is recorded.
Capture images with bright and blur effects
Camera settings reset to the default value
Video settings reset to the default value
Selected images will be deleted. Continue?
Selected photos will be deleted. Continue?
Beauty shot makes facial skin look brighter and smoother.
Make facial skin look brighter and smoother.
"6 sequential shots are taken with minimum time intervals by pressing the shutter. You can directly choose images to save and share(with \"auto review on\")."
Continuous shot takes six photos, one immediately after the other.
HDR combines photos taken at multiple exposures into one optimal photo to get a better photo in tricky lighting situations.
HDR combines photos taken at multiple exposures into one optimal photo to get a better photo in tricky lighting situations.
Live effect provides various visual effects when taking a video. Choose an effect, and begin recording.
Creates a wide photo of a panoramic view. Hold the phone horizontally, tap the shutter to start and slowly sweep the camera across the scene.
"Continuous photos are assembled into one spherical 360 panoramic image. Press shutter to start and pan the camera in any direction."
Time machine camera captures the missing moment before pressing the shutter.
Check and save the scenes you missed before taking shots.
Capture the moments before you press the shutter.
Time catch shot captures the moments before you press the shutter.
Time machine camera captures the missing moment before pressing the shutter. Only selected photos will be saved.
In Location services, enable Use 3G/4G/Wi-Fi location or Use GPS satellites to use geotagging.
%s should be enabled to use this function. Enable this application?
You will lose photos that have not been saved. Continue?
To view the moments just before this photo was taken, tap this button.
Check the photos that you want to keep.
Select the photos that you want to keep.
Select the photos that you want to keep and press save button.
Time catch shot captures the missing moment before pressing the shutter.
Time catch shot captures the missing moment before pressing the shutter. Only selected photos will be saved.
To display the photos that captured 1 second before the moment of shutter release, press this button.
Camera will be closed due to high device temperature.
Tap outlined object to remove and press save button.
There is no object to remove.
You will lose photo because process have not been saved. Continue?
Prevent shaking while video recording to get high video quality.
Photo has not yet been saved. Exit without saving?
Make recording taken at different exposures an optimal backlight-adjusted video with enhanced multiple exposure control.
Make recording taken at different exposures an optimal backlight-adjusted video with enhanced multiple exposure control.
Take up to 20 consecutive shots by holding the shutter.
Take up to 20 consecutive shots by holding the shutter.
Take a photo. Tap any of the outlined objects to remove it from the photo.
"Automatically identifies the scene's characteristics and takes a photo."
"Automatically identifies the scene's characteristics and adjusts aperture, shutter speed and other settings to take a photo."
Tap on the subject in the preview screen to track it and refine the focus.
Align both front and main cameras in one screen for recording.
"1. Drag to move the small screen. 2. Touch and hold the small screen to resize it. 3. Tap on the small screen to turn screens."
Pinch in to enhance the audio zooming sound
Increase sound sensitivity in zooming area and decrease noise when recording.
Pinch in a certain area to increase sound sensitivity and decrease noise. Available only in landscape view. Keep the side microphones released while using this feature.
Apply various visual effects when recording a video.
Make photos taken by multi-row 360-degree rotation into one wide-angle panoramic image.
"1. Press shutter to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guide line to take photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image."
Align both front and main cameras in one screen.
Enlarge focused area in a small screen when taking a video.
"Set magnifying glass to enlarge before recording video. 1. Use magnifying glass to enlarge areas of the video. 2. Small screen shows the enlarged area. Drag the screen to move it."
Change your view to landscape mode for optimal 3D effect.
"To edit quick menus, long press the icon."
Please make sure camera lens to be cleaned for the good image quality.
"To quickly check the taken photo, press and hold the gallery icon."
"Press and hold an icon to edit shortcuts."
"To quickly check the taken photo, touch and hold the gallery icon."
"Touch and hold an icon to edit shortcuts."
Portrait + makes the facial skin to appear brighter and smoother.
To display photo in 360 view, touch the screen.
Stopped taking a panorama shot for camera positioning. Photo is saved to the Gallery.
Audio zoom only activates in landscape view.
Combines photos taken at multiple exposures into one optimal photo to get a better photo in tricky lighting situations.
Take photo with normal camera mode.
Record video with normal recording mode.
"Allows you to select a focus area to enlarge. View it in the small screen and take a video."
Zoom only activates in rear camera.
Zoom not supported for this mode.
Zoom not supported for this resolution.
Capture photos in dark areas without flash.
Please cancel Disable of au application.
"1. Take photo. 2. Tap any of the outlined objects to remove it from the photo. 3. Press save button to save."
HDR combines photos taken at different exposures to one optimal photo while compensating for backlight by enhancing multiple exposure control.
"1. Tap shutter button to start. 2. Pan your phone slowly to one direction. 3. Tap stop button when finished."
"1. Tap shutter button to start. 2. Pan your phone slowly to one direction. 3. Fit focus area to blue guideline to take photo. 4. Tap stop button when finished."
"1. Press shutter to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guide line to take photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image."

"1. Tap shutter button to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guide line to take photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image. When taking VR Panorama photos, do not stand too close to the subject and keep a proper distance."

"1. Tap shutter button to start VR panorama mode. 2. Fit focus area to blue guide line to take a photo. 3. Move camera to catch another focus areas and take photos. The photos come together into one image. When taking VR Panorama photos, do not stand too close to the subject and keep a proper distance (16 ft or 5 m)."
Take brighter photos with a smaller preview while using front camera.
Take up to 20 shots quickly by pressing the shutter.
Beauty shot makes the facial skin look brighter and smoother.
"1. Take photo to start Time machine camera. 2. Press gallery button to review the missing moments. 3. Select the photos that you want to keep. 4. Press save button."
"1. Take photo to start Time catch shot. 2. Press gallery button to review the missing moments. 3. Select the photos that you want to keep. 4. Press save button."
Automatically identifies the characteristics of the scene and takes a photo.
"1. Drag to move small screen. 2. Touch and hold to re-size small screen. 3. Tap small screen to swap screen."
"1. Select effect that you want to use. 2. Press record button and start recording."
HDR recording enhance your video by multiple exposure control.
WDR recording enhance your video by multiple exposure control.
UHD video recording available up to 5 minutes to maintain recommended temperature. Video recording will close.
"Notification LED blinks when face is detected. You can change setting in Settings > Display> Notification LED."
Camera unavailable for a while due to temporary problem. Try again.
Choose your focus again after taking a photo.
To refocus this photo, tap here.
Get close to your object and hold the phone steady while taking a photo
All parts of your photo in focus
"1. Take a photo and tap the Gallery button. 2. To change focus, tap an object or adjust handler. 3. Tap the Save button to save the refocused photo."
Tap an object or adjust handler to change focus, then tap (#1#) in upper right corner
Tap an object or adjust handler to change focus, then tap Save button in upper right corner
Screen Capture is disabled by server policy.
Make a fist to take photo
Take selfies with hand gesture. To take photo, raise your hand until front camera detects it and a box appears on the screen. Then, make a fist to take a photo.
